name: Hex Harmonia
description:
***

Quiet your heart and listen and wait,

the hexagon has games it wants you to play.

***

A UCSC CMPM/ARTG 170 Jam Game. Solve the puzzle rooms in the hexagon.

Credits:

Annie Zhang - Producer, Gameplay Designer

Autumn Moulios - Sound Designer, Composer, Gameplay Designer

Benjamin Chavez - 3D Artist

Calex Raffield - Lead Programmer, Gameplay Designer

Michael Christian Remorin - 3D Artist, UI Artist

Minmini Sanganathan - 3D Artist

Sophie Martin - Sound Designer, Composer, Gameplay Designer

Thrisha Kopula - Programmer, Gameplay Designer

Yiyang Lu - Programmer, Gameplay Designer

***

Pay mind to the things that feel most real,

And break open the floors to find the seal.

***
